snippet: The State Labor Department, in a new report, said the rate was 9.1 percent, up from 8.8 percent in December.
abstract: New York State Labor Department reports that New York City's unemployment rate is 9.1 percent, up from 8.8 percent in December; final revisions of data for 2012 also indicate that the city has been adding jobs at a faster pace than previously estimated.
lead_paragraph: The State Labor Department, in a new report, said the rate was 9.1 percent, up from 8.8 percent in December.

headline.seo: New York City Jobless Rate Hit 9.1 Percent in January
headline.main: City’s Jobless Rate in January Hit 4-Month High
headline.print_headline: Jobless Rate For City Back Above 9%, New Data Say
